contents: @范松忠:美国的话，对于菲律宾的政策是没有给国籍“Philippines and the Panama Canal Zone were unincorporated US territories that Congress never extended birthright citizenship to. Consequently the people born in the Philippines prior to independence were only non-citizen US nationals, not US citizens.” 所以应该说独立前的菲律宾是最类似于香港目前地位的
